pages.title: Liquid Crystal
pages.text: The pure energy of gemstones in liquid form. It is said to have a healing effect.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Combining it with various other liquids results in all kinds of interesting looking materials.

Letting Liquid Crystal collide with [Liquid Mud](book://magical_blocks/mud) created [#](bb00bb)Clay[#]()! Surely there are more combinations to discover!\\_Thomas had never seen such unbalance before._
Letting a full block of Liquid Crystal absorb the immense heat of Lava resulted in this.\Almost feels like a [#](bb00bb)Magma Block[#](), albeit way hotter.
As [#](bb00bb)Water[#]() tried to flow into a full block of Liquid Crystal the crystal solidified.\Since even a light touch is enough to give you a cold shiver, you called it Frostbite Crystal.
This is an interesting one. When [#](bb00bb)Flowers[#]() absorb this magical liquid through their roots, they turn into those elusive plants.
